name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: PocketRus: Russian-English AI Dictionary & Grammatical Cases

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Russian-English AI dictionary offering translations and grammatical cases for Russian words, with the option to save translations.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üåç AI-Powered Russian-English Dictionary & Translator Extension

----------------------------
Unlock fast, accurate Russian-to-English and English-to-Russian translations with advanced AI. This Chrome extension not only provides detailed grammatical cases for Russian words‚Äîcovering nominative, genitive, dative, accusative, instrumental, and prepositional forms‚Äîbut also allows you to save words and translations for easy review later.
----------------------------

üîë Key Features:

‚ö° AI-Driven Translations:
Get precise and up-to-date translations, perfect for students, professionals, and language enthusiasts.

üìö Grammatical Case Insights:
Easily understand and apply Russian grammatical cases like genitive, dative, instrumental, and more.

üíæ Save Translations:
Build your personalized vocabulary list by saving important translations for future reference.

üñ±Ô∏è User-Friendly Design:
Enjoy a simple, intuitive interface for fast, reliable translations at your fingertips.

üéì Ideal for Language Learners:
Enhance your Russian language skills by enhancing grammar and vocabulary with a tool built specifically for students and language enthusiasts.



<---------------------------->
